title.bibl: Il Corriere Italico, Dec. 20, 1937. President Petrillo Reelected

div.bibl: Il Corriere Italico, Dec. 20, 1937. PRESIDENT PETRILLO REELECTED

body.p: P.1--With unqualified praise for his work one of the largest local units of the Federation of Musicians has reelected James C. Petrillo as president for his fourteenth consecutive term.
Mr. Petrillo's personality and achievements are frankly admired by the members of the Federation.
He has devoted all his sympathies and his kindly efforts to the welfare of his fellow-musicians, whose hearts he has won.
